content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Updated)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generation system at x=-25.0 y=80.5
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at x=-20.5 y=69.5 (connected to water system)
- Boiler at x=-25.0 y=80.5 (now working with coal fuel)
- Steam engine at x=-25.5 y=89.5 (producing 13500-15000 power but not connected to network)
- Pipe networks:
  - Water system (ID 1454) connecting pump to boiler
  - Steam system (ID 1458/1676) with connection issues between boiler and engine

### Copper mining operation at x=-46.5 y=70.5 (expanded to x=-55.5 y=70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at x=-46.5 y=70.5 (output blocked, no power)
- New electric mining drill at x=-55.5 y=70.5 (no power)
- Stone furnace at x=-55.0 y=75.0 (no ingredients)
- Burner inserter at x=-55.5 y=73.5 (working)
- Wooden chest at x=-55.5 y=76.5 (empty output storage)
- Small electric pole at x=-53.5 y=72.5 (not powering drills)

### Iron mining operation at x=15.5 y=70.5
(No changes from previous report)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at x=15.5 y=70.5 (currently no power)
- Stone furnace at x=16.0 y=74.0 (no ingredients)
- Burner inserter at x=15.5 y=72.5 (working)
- Wooden chest at x=15.5 y=75.5 (empty output storage)

## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent power connection issues
- Connect electric mining drills to power network (all drills show "no power")
- Complete steam engine power network connection (producing power but not connected)
- Verify small electric pole connections (poles exist but not powering drills)

### Fluid system connection problems
- Fix steam pipe connection between boiler (x=-25.0 y=80.5) and engine (x=-25.5 y=89.5)
- Verify pipe alignment and connection points (failed connection attempt at x=-26.5 y=80.5)
- Ensure unobstructed fluid paths between components

### Entity verification failures
- Verify entity existence before operations (repeated burner inserter access failures)
- Implement position validation before entity placement
- Track entity state changes (missing furnaces in some steps)

### Production chain issues
- Supply coal to all burner inserters and furnaces
- Clear output blockages on mining drills
- Verify inserter pickup/drop positions (x=-55.5 y=71.5 to x=-55.5 y=73.5)

### System monitoring
- Implement regular status checks for all production systems
- Monitor fuel levels in boilers and furnaces
- Track power production and consumption metrics
